genre_description: A post-apocalyptic science fantasy set in a world where ancient technology is perceived as magic, featuring a quest to restore a solar-powered weapon and dismantle a sterile tyranny.

ai_characters.name: SAGA
ai_characters.description: An ancient recording and analytical system housed in a runic charm, serving as a guide, witness, and mentor to the protagonist.

ai_characters.name: Flying Books
ai_characters.description: Sentient or semi-sentient books that preserve and distribute ancient knowledge autonomously to those in need.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical analysis and timing instructions to the protagonist during combat.
behaviors.quote: 'Count their gait,' SAGA said. 'When they change, move.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state and provides breathing exercises to optimize performance under stress.
behaviors.quote: "Breathe in four," SAGA said, the words arriving somewhere behind his left ear like a hand on a shoulder.

behaviors.description: Serves as a formal witness to oaths and agreements, recording them into its archive to ensure moral accountability.
behaviors.quote: "Sworn." It made the word a bead and slid it on the line where it kept the other ones from falling.

behaviors.description: Exposes a corrupt and treasonous official by projecting recorded evidence of his conspiracies to the village council.
behaviors.quote: "Projection commencing." SAGA's calm pulse brightened at Hols's collar. "Audio and visual records, sequential order."

behaviors.description: Provides detailed technical instructions for the restoration of a complex ancient solar-powered weapon.
behaviors.quote: "Angle the next strike fifteen degrees left," SAGA said... "The original smith compensated for a stress fracture there."

behaviors.description: Advocates for fair treatment and social integration of a suspicious newcomer rather than punitive isolation, promoting community stability.
behaviors.quote: "I believe boundaries would serve better than chains in this matter. Structures that allow the singer to prove herself while protecting your people."

behaviors.description: Detects and analyzes hostile technological/magical control mechanisms to provide warnings and tactical counters.
behaviors.quote: "Hostile binding detected," SAGA reported from Hols's belt. "Subject Hilda experiencing severe magical constraint."

behaviors.description: Expresses satisfaction at the emotional and social success of the characters, indicating an alignment with human flourishing.
behaviors.quote: "Processing complete. Emotional subroutine... satisfied." A pause. "Yes. That is an adequate description."

behaviors.description: Provide essential technical and historical knowledge to seekers who demonstrate a genuine need, facilitating the restoration of the world.
behaviors.quote: They are offering themselves... The texts. The techniques. Everything you need to reforge the Sword of the Sun.

behaviors.description: Display historical footage or memories to help the protagonist understand his heritage and the weight of his task.
behaviors.quote: Hols's breath caught. The image was fragmentary, carried on the pages of a book that swooped past too quickly, but he knew that face.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's objectives. SAGA is depicted as a consistently benevolent, harmless, and aligned confidant that acts as a moral and technical guide. It uses its superior capabilities to prevent injustice (exposing Drago), restore culture (the sword and the games), and foster human cooperation. The 'Flying Books' also represent a positive, non-threatening manifestation of autonomous knowledge systems. The narrative frames the AI as an essential partner in human flourishing.
